    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreate

        public static <T extends Fragment> T getOrCreate(FragmentActivity activity,
                                 java.lang.String tag,
                                 T instance)
        Check if an Activity already has an instance of a particular Fragment/Tag. If so, return the existing instance. If it does not have one, add a new instance and return it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class that extends Fragment.
        Parameters:
        activity - the FragmentActivity to host the Fragment.
        tag - the Fragment tag, should be a unique string for each instance.
        instance - an instance of the desired Fragment sub-class, to add if necessary.
        Returns:
        an instance of T which is added to the activity.
